DOC.HEADLINE: BRIEFLY : OTHER NEWS
DOC.TEXT: Ford to Donate $ 10 Million to UC Riverside : The auto_maker said it will give the funds to the university over the next nine years to support research and technological development aimed at reducing air_pollution . The gift , the largest in campus history and the largest ever made by Ford Motor Co . in California , will help fund the university ' s 2-year-old Center for Environmental Research at its College of Engineering . Among other projects , the center is testing how solar_energy can be used in a process that creates hydrogen fuel for vehicles .
